postDeployApiTagInstructions.value: To correctly assign the tag in policies ⚠️: Go to Sophos Central → My Products → Endpoint → Policy → Settings → Add new. In the "Website Tag" field, enter the tag selected during deployment and in the "Action" field choose the 'block' option.
